docs.text: ABC-1: As a user, I should be able to change the count, so that I can keep count of things. home page Expect: Should see initial count of zero Should not see a count of -1 Should not see a count of 1 Analytics: Screen: home As a user, I want to be able to decrement the count Expect: Should see count decremented by one Actions: TAP: text "Decrement" Events: CounterEvent_Decrement Analytics: Track: Counter: Decrement As a user, I want to be able to increment the count Expect: Should see count incremented by two Actions: TAP: text "Increment" TAP: text "Increment" Events: CounterEvent_Increment CounterEvent_Increment Analytics: Track: Counter: Increment Track: Counter: Increment
